Review.Contenu: A pump and dump signal is where a coin pumps massively (100%+ easily) and CBS sends a signal on the crash back down.I have 4 live trade bots & 4 paper trading bots. I'm backtested it.Indeed I think CBS signal algorithm still in developing session. It's need to be upgrade for filterout pump and dump signal. Small profit huge loss. profitability (30-50 trades) get wiped out by one single “pump and dump signal”. it's horrible !

Review.Contenu: Altrady's BOT does what it is supposed to do. It is simple to learn, to understand how it works: and makes security of every transaction a priority. Altrady encrypts all customer data and NO-ONE, but the customer knows the password to trade. It communicates with other trading platforms in a seamless way. Moreover, when I had a question, I was able to reach Altrady's Customer Service within  a minute. When it comes to money, the Customer Service aspect becomes quite important. One of the main aspects of this department is how knowledgeable their staff is. Altready offers the best value for my money, and it has allowed me to focus on achieving positive results on my trading.

Review.Contenu: Is was a value to see different perspectives of a concept that can move a mountain of financial setbacks and create the possibility of a brand new start with a brand new game of financial self mastery.It's exciting.

Review.Contenu: I've been with Altrady 3 years after being frustrated with Coinigy. The support is great. Ben, Jenn and several others are very approachable, and exceedingly helpful. Review.Titre: Great  bots and smart trading controls.
Review.Contenu: I found Altrady when I first got into crypto.  But I didn't continue to use the software...didn't realize some of the unique features of the base scanner and trading bots.But I have found my way back, and find that the platform has many features that will enable a skilled trader to plan and execute trades effectively or to automate them through bots.They have really responsive customer service.  So I would highly recommend this platform.

Support staff is patient and makes it a point to address all problems quickly and thoroughly. There's a genuine interest in making the platform accessible to all skill and knowledge levels and it's evident from the top all the way down. This is the trading platform I've been looking for.

Best platform you can find for trading with one or multiple accounts.

Review.Titre: Great platform with a big variety of…
Review.Contenu: Great platform with a big variety of trading options, including ladder orders, smart orders and bots. Very accessable and no-nonsense team. Quick response from helpdesk,  also late at night or in weekends. If there is an issue, Benoist (founder) and his team jumps in to solve, fix or improve.

Tech support. I was driving myself crazy for 3 hrs trying to figure out some settings I must have messed up to not let me trade properly on futures market. I got onto the discord server, went to support, Timothy started helping me, then sent me over to the main Altrady support page so I could sent some screen shots showing the problem. He noticed the issue within 2 minutes. I changed the setting, and now I'm back off to the races. Thanks again Timothy!
Altrady has extremely knowledgeable people in their customer support area. You chat with real people who are quick to answer questions in a professional and personable way.  They are super!

I'm using Altrady for about 1,5 years now on a daily basis. I love the clear interface and the possibilities you get with smart orders. A great plus is the very supportive helpdesk in case you have questions or some trouble. The build in grid bot and signal bot are great too. I had some minor issues with replacing trendlines, but that's more a problem because Tradingview is not very supportive towards Altrady.

Review.Titre: Awesome trading tool and lightning fast support
Review.Contenu: Not much to say, Altrady has an amazing set of feature for trading. It might have bit of learning curve but it's worth it. As for the support, i never had to wait for more then 5 minutes for someone responding in the live chat. Very friendly people and also very patient.

Pretty good software, the UI/UX is amazing, the base scanner / quick scan is a pretty usefull tool, everything to get you started trading crypto. The dev team is amazing, the support is amazing, the only missing thing is some advanced trading features but as we can see this is actively developed with a lot of efforts so this can only get better & better, can't wait to see the futures updates ! :D

HAPPY USER REVIEWStarted the crypto journey mid 2020 with no trading background. Initially signed up to Altrady to get a big picture portfolio overview. Friends used Hypertrader, I sticked with Altrady.. It is of Dutch origin and Benoist is a brilliant no nonsense company owner. At the time I was missing Bitvavo as an exchange and several indicators that came along during the learning experience. I decided to trust the feedback from Altrady support that many more features would be added in a fast pace.Well, Altrady delivered! Soooo many new functions and features are added every day and support is always super fast and extremely helpful.Altrady makes the road to grow from a beginning trader to advanced user so much better.

smart positions are great, the progress made since the initial release blows my mind. the developers help you pretty quick with amy issues you might have and a monthly report for profitable signals is released regulary. never regret buying a lifetime package so far

Review.Titre: Exactly what I needed to bring my trading to the next level
Review.Contenu: I heard of Altrady from a couple friends that use it. I thought nothing of it - "oh this is just another trading platform/exchange". Then I looked into it and realized it is every trading platform I use consolidated into one spot. Rather than having a million tabs open to check each one (I used 4 different ones) I can now use Altrady to track each one! It saves so much time and hassle and I regret not setting it up sooner. This is exactly what the crypto trading community needed and I'm grateful to the amazing Altrady team that has helped me so far!

I've been using Altrady for a few years now and I'm always amazed by the scope and possibilities of this trading platform.  If I have to compare Altrady with others, I can only say that it is not possible, because what Altrady offers is unique.  it's so unique that you can't live without it and you have to come back immediately.  The bot is indescribable.  Based on QF Luc's idea.  if you don't know Quickfinger's Luc, you've missed something.His idea of ​​trading Crypto is amazing.  He sadly deleted all his videos on youtube and yet he remains a legend.  I will forever be grateful for the best tip I've ever received.  thank you Altrady for creating such an amazing bot and trading platform.

They have tremendous customer support. I just discovered this platform and I wish I had discovered it sooner. It is of high quality and I use it with great enthusiasm. As for the negative reviews; they are likely from a competing company. Don't pay attention to them. This is a wonderful platform and the customer service representatives are exceptionally good. It deserves more than 5 stars.I will share my experiences here again after a month has passed. That's all for now.

It's the best crypto trading platform out there. Especially when you want to manage your assets over multiple exchanges.App provides some handy tools to place trades e.g. using a ladder and to analyses your portfolio growth.It also has the function to automatically scan for drops and notify you. I use it to trade automatically. It's a bit of work to set up automatic trading, but I doubled my value on Kucoin with it.

Fast and reliable trading platform. Great ability to link many different exchanges.Built-in Signalsbot works super well. Good profits.Customer service works fast. Also accessible through different channels (Discord, chat). Problems/questions I asked were resolved quickly.All in all a nice and reliable platform to use.

Altrady is a complete crypto trading platform made by traders for traders.The UI is clean and highly customizable. The UX is simple and intuitive.It integrates some of the most popular exchanges into one easy to use interface.The dev and support team are fantastic and they are continuously developing and improving the platform.This is, by far, the best crypto trading tool on the market and it's getting better and better every day.Well done!
Altrady is an awesome trading terminal. Most terminals offer basic trading features, altrady goes the extra mile.The past few months they've added handy new features which help active traders alot.
The Altrady platform is top-notch, the software is out of this world, and the features are second-to-none. Supa impressed!

Altrady offers very good customer support.  The extensive smart orders enable complete trade setups, including a P&L calculation per trade and the Risk Reward ratio for your trade account.  The program is suitable for all crypto exchanges and offers a complete package of trading facilities such as: a base scanner, quick-scan FF, grid and signal bots, alerts and order positions.  The paper accounts make it possible to test a trading strategy in advance on any exchange based on a fictitious trading budget.  Simply the best.
Altrady customer service offered nice trial period while I was not able to pay my subscription being out of  town. Thank you for your understanding.

Altrady is awesome.  The customer support on its own is worth the 5 Star review.  Possibly the best customer support that I have ever received from a digital company.The product/trading terminal drastically improved my trading and my profits.  I use Coinbase Pro (GDAX) as my primary account and I find that interface to be nearly unusable and very difficult to work with.  The integration with between that and Altrady was quick and very straightforward.  This put all of the information that I could not find on CBPro right in front of me and it was very customizable.I highly recommend this software for both the product and the support.

Review.Titre: Great platform and excellent customer support
Review.Contenu: I had set up a bot to make some trades. After looking at one of the trades, I was confused why the trade was opened because there was no base on the chart. After contacting support, I was asked to enter my email address. I entered my email address and Timothy with support answered in under 2 mins. He explained that the position was opened with conservative settings and showed me how to change from day trader to conservative settings with a screenshot. I was manually changing the chart from 1 hour to 2 hour for the day trader and conservative settings, which was not working. Being new to the Altrady platform, I did not understand I had to change the algorithm settings under base info. Support was fast and courteous. I also was using another bot platform at the time, and the signals from Altrady seem to be superior, and I was able to get out of trades faster. I am very happy with the bot, trading terminal, and the customer support. Keep it up, guys!

Review.Titre: i am new with this solfware and Timothy…
Review.Contenu: i am new with this solfware and Timothy help me step by step in details on Sunday . It is amazing how helpful of him to be patient with me until i finish the set up . Highly recommand this company!

Top voor ‘Crypto’ Traders!Altrady is naar mijn idee super gebruiksvriendelijk, het kent vele opties voor traden met handige smart orders. De meeste zaken die ik gebruik zitten in het basis abonnement, Altrady is daarmee een uitgebreid en zeer prettige tool voor het Traden. Ik leer nog steeds bij en ben nog lang niet klaar met alle opties te leren ontdekken elke keer ontdek ik wel iets nieuws. Zo is er ook een scanner optioneel maar die ken ik nog niet. Naast de opties die er al inzitten zijn ze constant in ontwikkeling en wordt het steeds beter en uitgebreider, ook voor GridBot traders zijn er uitgebreide youtube filmpjes om je op weg te helpen. Het is een Nederlands product met een goede, snelle en kundige helpdesk in meerdere talen. Ook handig zijn de diverse social media kanalen zoals Discord  en Telegram. Waar het een en ander uitgelegd wordt door de ontwikkelaar en de team leden en waar je simpele vragen kunt stellen of anders wordt doorverwezen helpdesk chat via de website. Op social media kunnen gebruikers elkaar ook helpen, op Discord zelfs in meerde kanalen.Kortom een aanrader als je een stabiel, uitgebreid en prettige tool zoekt, voor zowel beginners en gevorderde traders die zelf- of geautomatiseerd trades willen plaatsen.Top for 'Crypto' Traders!Altrady is super user-friendly in my opinion, it has many options for trading with handy smart orders. Most of the things I use are in the basic subscription, making Altrady a comprehensive and very enjoyable tool for Trading. I am still learning and am far from finished discovering all the options every time I discover something new. For instance, there is also a scanner optional but I don't know it yet. Besides the options that are already in it, they are constantly developing and getting better and more extensive, also for GridBot traders there are extensive youtube videos to get you started. It is a Dutch product with a good, fast and knowledgeable helpdesk in several languages. Also handy are the various social media channels such as Discord and Telegram. Where things are explained by the developer and team members and where you can ask simple questions or else be referred to helpdesk chat via the website. On social media, users can also help each other, on Discord even in multiple channels.In short, highly recommended if you are looking for a stable, comprehensive and pleasant tool, for both beginners and advanced traders who want to place trades themselves or automatically.

Review.Titre: The best of the best Platform
Review.Contenu: First of all, I would like to give due thanks to the support service, and this is the whole team Altrady. I have experienced a lot of services, and my experience is quite long. And this platform is all in one, all inclusive, and everything a trader needs to trade, many tools, alerts, robot trading automation, alerts for each trade.I like that the team themselves are traders, which means they understand what they are doing. The working environment on this platform is comfortable, and I feel here as if I am in their team, and not just a user.Their robots, which trade without interruption and confidently. Even if some kind of problem sometimes appears, then robots like an all-terrain vehicle and an armored car continue to trade further, notifying the trader to pay attention to the settings. With all this, the robot does not stop, which is a great advantage. I repaired it and the tarpedo flew on. ))The guys are always in touch and have a very strong patience with all clients, explain on the fingers until the client understands or jointly find bugs and misunderstandings. The guys recognize the mistakes with dignity, as if you are working with a friend together (they do not make excuses and do not evade), but quickly correct them.They also listen to clients about innovations, as it will be convenient in the first place for the user.I would like to write a lot, but already enough. I recommend them 1000% and you will be safe and comfortable in trading as one friendly family of traders. )) I think with this approach they will achieve a lot, and I wish to achieve a lot in development. The only thing I don’t understand is why he is not in the top, apparently they work for themselves and their clients, and marketing is secondary))). As of now, many have super marketing, but the product leaves much to be desired. I choose the first, this is the quality and reliability of the ALTRADY service. It's really a pleasure to work with them. This is the level of professionals.
This tool is simply fantastic for anyone who wants to actively trade!
